website_summaries.verdict: Sets up quickly while providing a very comfortable area for small pets to play either indoors or outdoors.
pros: Folds down to a small size so you can carry it anywhere
With mesh panels, the pet will receive a nice airflow and can see its surroundings
Uses metal stakes to secure the playpen against windy conditions when used outdoors
cons: Does not include a top, so animals who can jump easily will not be secured inside the pen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our Maltese puppy when I take her to work. She has lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: DNR

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with stains and falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, it smells like chemicals. Threads were coming out all over. Zipper not sewn in correctly and dangles from the top of the pen. Blue and black stains on the bag and the bottom of the pen. Looks cheap and poorly made. Very shoddy product. NO QUALITY CONTROL. CRAP. I'd give it no star if that was possible.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: A perfect spot for a bedtime problem
customer_reviews.text: Our dog wanted to sleep in the bedroom with us which is fine but half way thru the night she would get up onto the bed, wake us up, and make it hard to roll over, move our feet or anything because we were afraid we would suffocate her or hurt her; she is sooo small (she is a mini poodle). So we put her bed inside this portable playpen beside the bed and zipped it closed. She can see us and hear us and sleeps there all night till the morning. There is plenty of room for this 9 LB poodle to stand, turn, walk and of course, sleep. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: quaider

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED, BREAKS
customer_reviews.text: my items last forever, i’m so careful with things. i used this pen as a place for my bunny while i clean her room. a gentle, 2 pound animal. when i opened it up for the THIRD use, the top zipper didnt stay on the track all the way around. i have to tape a towel to the top. i loves this item soooo much until it didn’t work? very flimsy zipper. if this is rare i’d love to receive a replacement. /:
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitten!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this for our kitten! Took her in at 2 weeks and this was perfect for keeping her in while we weren't home or in bed u til she was old enough to be in the house with our big cat. Also was very easy to pack and take with us to the lake! She had plenty of room for her litter box with her in there.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Not high enough
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4.3 lb Morkie who can jump out of this playpen. The diameter is fine, it's the height that is not. I can't imagine what size dog it could retain. Newborn puppies perhaps? Additionally, the opening for the water bottle will not fit a standard size bottle. Even though this was sealed and new when I received it, it arrived with stains on the floor of the pen.
customer_reviews.author: JDJ

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and unsafe. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hopeful that I would love this playpen. Sadly, I didn't even like it. As soon as I opened it, I noticed the teeth on the zipper for the entrance had pulled apart...very flimsy. I opened it all the way, and the sides kept collapsing in. It came with yard stakes, so I gave it 2 stars, because if it were staked in a yard, it MIGHT be ok. However, I have very little faith the zipper would hold if my puppy dug at it, so safety is an issue as well. I initiated the return within 5 minutes of opening it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help pee pad train my 3 lb poodle puppy and it works amazing. She is after a week getting the hang of it. You can roll up the door and lay paper pee pads down and works great. Also nice to take to park for small dogs or if you need to contain the puppy but they still have room to play.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small animals
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my foster kittens and it worked great while they are young. Once the got bigger they would collapses it easily. They were also able to pick at the netting which caused some raveling but it still works fine. It is definitely good if you just want to use it a short time outside for some fresh air.
customer_reviews.author: Daily Woman

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about this falling apart since it is the cheapest of the pet play pen's on amazon, but it's surprisingly sturdy. Have used it for a rescue kitten, she loves to play both inside and on top of it and it holds up to cat nails and pouncing. Folds up well and super light weight, was easy to travel with for a short trip.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Not practical!
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use my 2 lbs. Chihuahua chewed the loose fabric in the corner fraying the trim . The worse part was the zipper on the top wasn't secure enough because my little pup managed to maneuver it opened and escaped. Not worth the money if a very tiny 2 lbs. puppy can break out.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Quality, easy set up, great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect play yard for our little yorkipoo. Plenty of space in this medium sized play yard for her to run laps in and play with toys. She loves it! We use it on the deck to to keep her safe and it’s easy to fold up as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Ann

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Put Away
customer_reviews.text: NO ASSEMBLY NECESSARY! It easily folds open and closed. The large size is big enough for a small litter box, food and water, and room for play. For my new born kitten, when I can’t be there to watch her. Does have a factory smell, I wiped it down with wipes and let it dry before use.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Wroubel

customer_reviews.title: Great price, looks cute, but it is not well made.
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of it and it is the perfect size for my 7lb adult morkie. It looks great. It is low quality as day one my dog began nibbling the loose fabric tags that stick out a lot all around the zippers and corners and tore it a little. I had to spray apple bitters around all the edges to keep my dog from shredding it. The price is right. It looks nice, but isn't meant for rough play. If your dog is the least bit nippy or curious, beware. You get what you pay for. If my dog shreds it, I will probably buy another because of cuteness and pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Mrofficerruiz

customer_reviews.title: Funtabulous Find
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect buy, my puppy loves it and her older brother has also enjoyed hiding out in it. It is very easy to move from place and so easy to wipe clean. My parents bought one for their house when the grand-pup's come to visit.
customer_reviews.author: Kiana M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Needs a metal zipper for tiny claws and teeth.
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to give this 5 stars, but, my puppy is tiny, I mean very small about 2 lbs small and she managed to tear a loop in the plastic zipper making it impossible to zip close. She can also pull the side down and hop right out.
customer_reviews.author: K. Michael Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Not for active dogs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for travel so I didn't have to carry a large crate. It was certainly easy to pack and doesn't take up a lot of space. However, my 9-pound dog was able to torpedo her way through the mesh. I got one use out of it. Wouldn't recommend it for dogs that won't sit still.
customer_reviews.author: Dcrutch

customer_reviews.title: I ordered wrong size. Still a good product
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately meant to order the large and ordered the small. Bought for a ferret, she can get out of it if the top is unzipped and learnt how to unzip it. Small is unfortunately useless for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: well made, I machine wash it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought for my Maltese. I wanted this new one for outdoors and kept the one I had previously bought for indoors. Unfortunately my dog passed away before I received the new playpen. I returned it with heavy sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Garabedian

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! I got this for my puppy for the office, but I opened it up at home first. Then I turned out I liked it so much at home that I bought a second one for the office! I got it because it’s the cheapest version on Amazon but you’d never know.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Tiny toy poodle ripping it apart...
customer_reviews.text: My 1.6 pd toy poodle is tearing up the inside of it... not very well built...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our puppy!
customer_reviews.text: The PETMAKER Portable Pop Up Pet Play Pen with Carrying Bag is perfect for our ShiChi puppy! We put her in it at night when she sleeps and if we have to leave the house for short periods of time. The zippered door and top are great for extra security or to allow some freedom. The unit is sturdy enough, yet lightweight enough to be carried around daily and we have folded it up and transported it numerous times without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to use as temporary containment for two cats. One managed to tear the mesh and escape but overall the quality is good for the price. They are still in use and I can fix the mesh if I feel like it.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleT

customer_reviews.title: Not kitten proof
customer_reviews.text: I used it when fostering 3 small newborn kittens. At 4 weeks they were able to bust out by chewing through a window seam. Now it's pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: MsChief

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Easy To Assemble, Loved It!!
customer_reviews.text: It Is Bigger Than I Thought It Would Be. My Babies Are Very Comfortable In Here All 5 Of Them. Just As Described & Brand New. Great Seller Thanx!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessika Duarte

customer_reviews.title: The little details could have used a little more effort.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t very well put together. Not the easiest to fold and put back in the bag, but the worst part is it’s literally the first day having it and the Velcro to hold the side door open fell off before I even got to use it. Could have used a few more stitches, but we will see how it holds up to my kitties over time. The zippers also are not the best so I won’t be surprised if they malfunction at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cute, quick to assemble and great for little kitten
customer_reviews.text: So our little 12 weeks kitten loves it. She loves popping in and out of it. Not very sturdy but I place it against the wall as she loves to run around it. Overall, I just wanted something to put her on when we go to bed so she doesn’t jump on us when we are sleeping. Mission accomplished
customer_reviews.author: M Kamtala

customer_reviews.title: Puppy LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful playpen/tent for our new puppy. she loves to bring all of her toys into her little house. It folds up nice and flat and is easy to transport and use anywhere. It even has pockets, a place for a drip water bottle, carrying case and stakes to hold it into place if needed.
customer_reviews.author: TMC

customer_reviews.title: Nice puppy "tent".
customer_reviews.text: This is a good "tent" as I call it. I stay at my daughters sometimes and at some friends sometimes. This is nice for my pup to be in if we go out to dinner etc. Room for her bed and food and water. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie12

customer_reviews.title: Great for my daughters rabbit
customer_reviews.text: Loved this play pen for small animals. Allows them to be in the room with you and not worry about messes
customer_reviews.author: Hot rod Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Great for my mothers new small puppy. She enjoys it for recharging naps and relaxing. Great that the top opens or closes your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Rdorman3

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Buy it for my bunny, but only 2 days later, she bit the whole thing, especially the zipper, cuz she want to escape.....so now the zipper is broken already...
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but arrived dirty
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 6 week old Shih-poo puppy. Plenty of room. Only complaint is the top of the play pen arrived dirty from what appears to be grease possibly? Pulled it out of carry bag and it looks new (unused), so I’m assuming possibly from manufacturers?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice to get the pink one that I ordered, but the blue is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dryburgh

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and idea for my 2.8lb yorkie. However, she broke through the zipper the second time she we used it so it is no longer usable. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jenn H

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the small brown one and it was so great I came back and ordered the larger pink one. Terrific for storing and just really great quality. My cats really like them. And I highly recommend. Thank you for creating these.
customer_reviews.author: Sp

customer_reviews.title: Puppy house
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to take care of little puppies in and too to see momma dog in there too..
customer_reviews.author: Hunnie

customer_reviews.title: Great play pen
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase!! Kitten loves it, kept her safe and now she bounces all around in it and on it.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for small breeds
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little effort to fold but definitely worth the time. The price is perfect and it is very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: liteskingirl

customer_reviews.title: Very cute very amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this play pen she sleeps in in too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kinga Zagrajek

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had 2 puppies less than 6 weeks old. Such a great idea and so spacious inside . I took it everywhere I went like a pack and go ...
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rivera

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep my dog safe when she is home alone.
customer_reviews.author: DEDE

customer_reviews.title: IT IS DEFINATELY NOT FOR YOUNG, OR TEETHING PUPPIES THE SCREEN PORTIONS ARE FLIMSY AND TEAR EASILY
customer_reviews.text: IT IS DEFINATELY NOT FOR YOUNG AND OR TEETHING DOGS, THE SCREEN PART IS FLIMSY, AND TEARS AWAY EASILY...........VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: chuck tharp

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to pop up and put down
customer_reviews.text: I love it smaller than I thought it would be but I Iove it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Melcher

customer_reviews.title: my dog loves it, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this just a couple hours ago, got it all set up and my little girl Journey, a small Yorkie loves it, i put her doggie bed in their and she lays on her doggie bed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Tremblay

customer_reviews.title: Two Pound Puppy Chewed Through
customer_reviews.text: The mesh door lasted less then two week for my 2 lb. pomeranian puppy. She chewed three holes in the mess door! She was also able to get it unzipped (I have no idea how) and I found my ten week old puppy running around the house one morning.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ashmore

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We used this for baby kittrns. We have had this same on before from the same company but this time the zipper on the top is broken so now they keep getting out. This one was not brand new. But it was supposed to be like new.
customer_reviews.author: Patty O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Look at sizes
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this, but my dog was easily able to get out if top wasn't on. If top was on she would bark and became agitated until she could get out. My dog is a toy dog, 5 lbs. The larger, taller one was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Landay

customer_reviews.title: zipper
customer_reviews.text: Top zipper does not hold up, I received two days ago and the zipper already broke. $30 plus dollars I expected this to hold up more. Other than the zipper, I do like the product. Perfect for a puppy, keeps her contained. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Christina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great for confining a new kitty or puppy
customer_reviews.text: This playpen is great for managing a new kitten or puppy while still allowing them to interact with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I love this for our chihuahuas. It’s easy to fold up and very lightweight but also durable.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Potter

customer_reviews.title: Not to keep your pet in for a very long time like play look
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for what I want it for thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Did the job initially. But 5 busy kittens learned to get out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: NanaG

customer_reviews.title: Cute but....
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but not for a chewer or dog that doesn't want to be locked up. I thought it would be usable in my bedroom at night. My Maltipoo pushed open and ripped the zipper one night and ripped the mesh the next.
customer_reviews.author: William Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: Uhh just no. Item ripped 1st day I had it. And it’s so small! Geeez! Not good for dogs! And honestly not great for cats either. Don’t waste your money. Spend a little bit more and save your self some time returning this thing. I didn’t even return mine just called it a loss.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste you're money
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a nice buy but didnt stand more than a week. Got holes in it etc..
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: It's spacious so your pup doesn't feel confined
customer_reviews.text: My dog is never crated and we were traveling and staying with family (that doesn't own dogs). Luckily she was less stressed in her personal play area opposed to be kenneled or caged. It fits perfectly in my suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: sportillo17

customer_reviews.title: Not for a chewer!
customer_reviews.text: It was nice while it lasted but my daughter’s ferret found her way out of it and chewed through it twice!
customer_reviews.author: Cortne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pup!
customer_reviews.text: I love my pup tent! It's perfect for my tiny Yorkie. Easy to put up and fold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality zipper
customer_reviews.text: This product is super cute, but the zippers are very flimsy. The roof zipper does not work. It’s doesnt pull the teeth together at all. Product will be okay for anyone with tiny dogs who are too small to jump out the top.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Stone

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was fine til my puppy was able to tear right through the mesh now it's just there can't use it anymore
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Santana

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your little pet safe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item for my dog. She doesn't mind being in it because she can see what is going on around her.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dayton

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little play pen. Unfortunately, the zipper on the top is broken. Going to return
customer_reviews.author: Pokey Jo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Puppy Sitter!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely babysitter for the puppy when we're not looking. Loved the ease of setting up and taking down.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: My 2 Yorkies love it
customer_reviews.text: Well belt and good big size for 2 small dogs
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: This sucks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and all I got was a big box of bathroom liners
customer_reviews.author: Cat lover 103

customer_reviews.title: Rips really easey
customer_reviews.text: It was ok but my. Dog riped it lol gotta get new one
customer_reviews.author: Billie Gorden

customer_reviews.title: Needs better zippers. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great concept needed better zippers. Both zippers are broken and this is no longer useable. I thought it would have lasted longervthan 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Tane Henley

customer_reviews.title: Would be good if not damaged.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it up the net was ripped so now I just wasted $20. My dog can fit right out the rip in the net
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy cobillas

customer_reviews.title: You need to make the screen stronger.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 11 week Pomchi within ten minutes she had chewed right through the screen. It was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Morong

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.text: It's good for traveling and it's good to take to the park or beach.
customer_reviews.author: Gisel Olmedo

customer_reviews.title: great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My cat, didn’t enjoy it. It’s a great size, easy to set up, quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: AmyChampe

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, my dog easily got out of it though and it’s kind of hard to fold
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Papen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, although I hoped the top would have been a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: K10

customer_reviews.title: Well made easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a small puppy. Easy to set up very nice looking easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Playpen
customer_reviews.text: I take my puppy to work with me & the playpen is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and so easy to pop up and store away, perfect for my puppy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: PETMAKER Portable Pop Up Pet Play Pen with Carrying Bag
product_meta.description:
Color:Pink| Size:MediumThe PETMAKER Portable Pop Up Pet Play Pen takes only seconds to set up, is great for indoor or outdoor use, provides a secure and comfortable area for your pet, is water resistant and comes in a convenient durable carrying case for travel and storage. The mesh windows allow for good air circulation and the roof is designed to provide both sun and shade options for your furry friend and is removable. We have included 2 pockets for storage, a hole and holder for an exterior water bottle and 4 easy to use metal stakes to secure the play pen during outdoor use. For your convenience, we have two, unzip to open, doors and have installed Velcro tabs to hold the door open if you choose.

“IMPORTANT: Avoid buying counterfeit products and transacting with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. PETMAKER is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on all our products, which we ensure by applying a rigorous Quality Control process. 

To clean use wet cloth and mild soap. Towel or air dry.
Materials: 100 % Polyester 600D Oxford cloth and mesh netting
Dimensions: 33 inches (Diameter) x 15.5 inches (Height)
Recommended for pets 25 lbs. or less
Color: Pink
feature_bullets: To clean use wet cloth and mild soap. Towel or air dry
Materials: 100 % Polyester 600D Oxford cloth and mesh netting
Recommended for pets 25 lbs. or less
